entry.title: Re @EvaFoxU @Reuters Exactly. The obvious reality, as long-time users know, is that Twitter has failed in trust & safety for a very long time and has ...
entry.summary: Re @EvaFoxU @Reuters Exactly. The obvious reality, as long-time users know, is that Twitter has failed in trust & safety for a very long time and has interfered in elections. Twitter 2.0 will be far more effective, transparent and even-handed.
